metadata.title: CVE-2023-47360 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Videolan VLC prior to version 3.0.20 contains an Integer underflow thatleads to an incorrect packet length.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-47360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvlc-bin - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
libvlc5 - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
libvlccore9 - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-bin - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-data - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-l10n - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-access-extra - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-base - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-fluidsynth - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-jack - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-notify - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-qt - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-samba - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-skins2 - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-svg - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-video-output - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-video-splitter - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-visualization - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
vlc-plugin-zvbi - 3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: vlc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-0ubuntu18.04.1+esm2').
